entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Trigger doesn't reset correctly when observable property is refreshed in OnAppearing method #15764
  • SemanticProperties.Description does not work on a span #15763
  • ScrollView with dynamically added Entries are not clickable #15762
  • Cannot interact with RadioButton on iOS in a Popup #15760
  • Fixing Invalidation Context error for MAUI iOS #15758
  • ColumnDefinition with * inconsistent #15757
  • Scroll Slow .Net Maui Android 7 CollectionView + slow tab switch Shell #15755
  • Maui - iOS build fails when resizing png file #15751
  • Placeholder font size not applied in editor on macOS and iOS #15750
  • Native support for Sharpen implementation in Android #15747
  • Native support for Blur implementation in Android #15745
  • DatePicker is not localization in the calendar view. #15744
  • A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_New Recipe_Labels or Instructions: In "New Recipe" screen required fields are not marked up with any chevron/symbols. #15743
  • Publish exe - console show wrong outout #15742
  • A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_Screen reader: After changing the value for review, Screen reader is not announcing new value its announcing incorrect rating value. #15741
  • A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_NonTextContrast: Disabled "Save" button is not looking like disabled. #15740
  • Project report issue #15736

Closed

  • Android publish: error NETSDK1191: A runtime identifier for the property 'SelfContained' couldn't be inferred #15696
  • Scroll to new view without tabs #15171
  • ListView GroupHeaderTemplate produces blank headers on iOS and MacCatalyst #13076
    .NET 8
  • Grid rows overlap when a cell content is wrapped #13315
    Backlog
  • Android: CollectionView.Scrolled returns wrong First/LastVisibleItemIndex when a Header/Footer is set #13471
    Backlog
  • Separate Window Management from IApplication #8823
    Backlog
  • Remote images not working in Image tag in latest version on Android #15735
  • [net7.0-iOS] Cannot debug my project with Linker disabled #15703
  • the screen szie of different mobile phones is how the page title is centered? #15712
  • Button in release, cannot change the background color #14153
  • .NET MAUI, how to load the iOS crash report to Visual Studio #15726

PullRequests

Created

  • [CI] Move away from template parameters to help moving to a matrix strategy. #15761
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15748
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • Android x nuget bumps #15746
    area/platform
  • [net7.0] Fix incorrect calculation of expansion size when *s have different scalars #15737
    area/layout 🔲

Merged

  • [android] support more system font names #15759
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • Bump cake.tool from 2.1.0 to 2.3.0 #15752
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [uitests] Fix xcode uitests #15749
  • feat: adding IWindowCreator #14921
    community ✨
  • Just run the pack every time #15588
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Tizen] Bump tizen preview6 #15724
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, platform/tizen
  • Remove HandlerImpl folder and put partial files together #14339
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Set the SafeAreaInset Property with updated value #15512
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Fix menu item command binding (#13848) #14345
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-menubar
  • [iOS] Handle focus changes for UIButton #10614
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Implement all permutations of InputTransparent and CascadeInputTransparent #14846
    area/layout 🔲
  • Fix DataTrigger behavior that can cause some strange inconsistencies #15655
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • [net8.0] Use darc for packs from runtime #15731
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • [CI] Remove template explosion on the maui templates build tests. #15365
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [android] improve performance of Shell flyout opening #15733
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Manual updates 20230615 Android ecosystem nugets bumped #15685
    area/platform
  • Fix issues with ScrollView on ios that does not correctly resize when… #15460
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • Update DEVELOPMENT and README to make it clear that you need to run the build tasks. #15030
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Implement rate for TextToSpeech on supported platforms #15528
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Windows] Implement ItemsUpdatingScrollMode on CollectionView #15601
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView broken test #15584
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Refactor `IsRefreshing` property to separate animation and command execution responsibilities #15732
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance. #15734
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢
  • Fix IsSpellCheckEnabled #15459
    area/controls 🎮
